Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item with unmatched features and quality. Considering its value and what it offers, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I kindly propose a purchase price of $9,500 for this product. This price reflects not only its market value but also allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a satisfactory arrangement. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
